page.title: 12MAY FESTIVAL - ETON WICK
page.content: Every year{Eton Wick School}holds a {May Fayre.}At the beginning we sing a song. In 1985 we started with "Good morning Lords and Ladies". The Town Crier told us what was going to happen. Each class presented a song,dance or poem in front of the May Queen. {The May Queen}has a special dress and a crown of flowers. She has a maid of honour and a little girl and boy attendant. The boy has to give the crown to the maid to put on the Queen's head. In 1985 each class had a person to take a card to the town crier and he shouted out what was going to happen next. Each class did some country dancing. The top year do the{Maypole {Dancing}which is a special part of the Festival.At the end the{May Queen declares it over and the stalls open.
